textContent:
---intro---

By the time I started writing these letters, we've basically already told each other that we like each other (*blush* ackk. Dejk. Raph magpigil ka, dapat romantic to, bawal jejemon). Which was totally amazing and wonderful and nakakakilig (ano english neto?)! And I wouldn't have it any other way hehe. Pero my original plan was to actually admit my feelings of you (kahit na obvious na obvious na sila) through these letters which I'll then give to you after our first date! Pero ayon change of plans and now I'm thinking of what to write in these letters instead haha.

---commercial break---

I'm writing this while you are sleeping just after your night shift hahaha. 

I suddenly missed you. We've started talking on your day offs, so not talking to you in this weekend afternoon is new to me.

Chat kaya kita? Ackkksksjs hehe.

Ayon chinat na kita. Mali mali lang ata spelling. Typo yon, typo.

---the purpose of these letters---

So ayon, I was thinking about the new purpose of these letters when I suddenly thought about how the way we admitted our feelings for each other was nothing less than perfect already. 2 AM deep talks? It's the epitome of a Gen Z romantic experience already. Pwede na ikwento sa anak.

Nonetheless. However. Subalit. Datapwat.

Sabi ko sayo, Rei. Masama ugali ko. I'm greedy. I'm competitive. I'm selfish. I'm a sometimes-socially-awkward-and-misunderstood boy who just happened to like you. Malas mo. Madami ka sigurong kasalanan sa past life mo.

I want to be memorable Rei, I'm greedy like that. Don't get me wrong, I'm not obsessed with you or something, but I just want to be someone you'll never forget. I want myself to run in your mind 24/7. I might even go so far as to say that, I want to be your whole world (The last sentence is a joke and is only said for theatrical purposes, I value your individuality and strong personality Rei. It's one of your best, if not the best, assets hahaha. But the thing about want to unforgettable and wanting to be someone you think about is true hehe).

So ayon, if these letters can help me become the best love interest of your life. Bat hindi. I won't hold myself back Rei.

Therefore. In conclusion. Bilang katapusan. The purpose of this letter is no longer to tell you the fact that I like you (kase sinabi ko na, so much for my self-proclaimed tsundere-ism amp), but to tell you how much I like you, what I like about you, and to flex myself in the most romantic way possible so that you'll eventually like me too.
